intro: Crawfurdia tsangshanensis, commonly known as the Tsangshan Crawfurdia, is a flowering plant native to China. It belongs to the family Apocynaceae, which includes milkweeds and related species. The plant is characterized by its showy, trumpet-shaped flowers that are typically pink or red in color. It thrives in moist, well-drained soils and is often found in forested areas. Due to its limited distribution, it is considered a rare and potentially endangered species.
